summary: A violin prodigy and his father travel to Beijing, where the father seeks the means to his son's success while the son struggles to accept the path laid before him.
cast: Yun Tang|Peiqi Liu|Hong Chen|Zhiwen Wang|Kaige Chen|Qiang Chen|Qing Zhang|Hye-ri Kim|Bing Liu|Chuan-Yuan Li|Ru-Yun Tang|Haiyan Zhang
title: Together (Juntos)
